content:
From: Amine Chaieb <chaieb@in.tum.de>
Hi,

David Streader wrote:
try :

use_thy "Lts"

instead of use_thy "Lts.thy"

Amine.

From: Tobias Nipkow <nipkow@in.tum.de>
If you want to print just a single theory, in ProofGeneral you can go
Isabelle -> Commands -> display draft, which generates a pdf file and
starts the previewer.

Tobias

David Streader wrote:
